title: 15: I Promise He’ll Call You Back After This ft. Shan Boodram
description:
FINALLY Sofia is joined by a real life professional. Shan Boodram is a leading sexologist, relationship expert, and dating coach. Our prayers have been answered! Together the two discuss the real meanings of self love, how FWB can turn into marriage, breakdown love as an addiction, and how to get through withdrawals after a breakup...because let’s be real- LOVE IS A DRUG. Shannon puts Sofia through a self confidence exercise that we ALL should try. Also, if you’re anything like Sofia and can’t let some fuckgirl behaviors go, don’t worry, there is still plenty in this episode.
Check out Shan’s IG @shanboody 

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/
